title: Password Reset
content: Users can reset their password from Settings > Security. If Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) is enabled, a backup code or registered device is required.

title: Email Verification Failed
content: If you see 'Verification link expired', request a new link from Profile > Email. Verification links expire in 10 minutes.

title: Billing and Subscription
content: Basic plan: $10/user/month. Pro plan: $25/user/month with audit logs and SSO. Enterprise: custom pricing with SLA and dedicated support.

title: SSO Login Issues
content: SSO failures often occur if the identity provider metadata is outdated. Refresh SAML metadata under Admin Portal > SSO Settings.

title: Exporting Reports
content: Admins can export audit reports in CSV or JSON from the Analytics tab. Exports over 100 MB are automatically compressed.

title: API Rate Limits
content: Each API key is limited to 200 requests per minute. For bulk imports, use the /batch endpoint supporting up to 10,000 records per request.

title: System Outage Notification
content: Outages and maintenance updates are posted at status.productgenie.io. Users can subscribe via email or RSS feed.
